mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FESTI(NUM, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENTS, REG_DATE, HIT, CATEGORY, PRICE, TOTAL, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, LOCAL, TOP, AGE, REGION) VALUES(#{num},#{title},#{writer},#{contents},sysdate,0,#{category},#{price},#{total},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{local},#{top}, #{age}, #{region})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, F.* FROM (SELECT NUM, TITLE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, LOCAL, region FROM FESTI FULL JOIN FILES USING(NUM) WHERE CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY NUM DESC) F) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
